page.title: 04FARMING AND EDUCATION
page.content: {NAFFERTON FARM}HAS 6 WORKERS,THIS INCLUDES THE MANAGER AND A PART TIME SECRETARY.IT IS FARMED COMMERCIALLY AS A DEMONSTRATION UNIT FOR NEWCASTLE UNIVERSITY.THE STUDENTS DO NOT WORK ON THE FARM,THEY LEARN THE THEORY IN NEW_ CASTLE THEN VISIT THE FARM TO SEE IT BEING PUT INTO PRACTICE.THEY ARE TAKEN ON WALKS BY THE MANAGER AND CAN SEE CHARTS AND COMPUTER PROJECTIONS OF FUTURE TRENDS.HE IS TRANSFERRING ALL HIS RECORDS ONTO THE COMPUTER AND FINDS IT A GREAT ADVANTAGE.EVERY COW IS RECORDED,WHAT FEED THEY RECEIVE, ANY DRUGS,THEIR MILK YIELD AND THEIR EXACT BREEDING CYCLE CAN BE PLOTTED SO THAT PLANNING FOR THE FUTURE IS SIMPLIFIED.FIELD RECORDS,A DAILY DIARY,COSTINGS AND FINANCIAL INFORFATION ARE ALSO COMPUTERISED.
